name: Battlerush Arena
description:
Heroic battles, awesome loot, heart-racing competition, and ... math? Battlerush Arena is a competitive multiplayer RPG game focused on solving arithmetic problems faster than your opponent. Enter a pressing battle arena of tricky math problems and competitive opponents. Take the mental math challenge and prove your sword fighter skills by using your mental math solving abilities. Whoever solves the problems faster wins the battle. There are no hard rules – all you need to do is solve idle RPG Math learner questions and become the ultimate sword fighter to claim victory over your opponent.



Play BattleRush Arena – PVP Fight, Solve Math Problems now!



**Enter the Math Learner Battle Arena**
Test your skills against other players around your skill level, and train to get better in the battle arena! It’s now super easy to improve your math skills, with mental math challenges and cool hero battle enemies thrown into the mix! Unleash your warrior spirit and combine it with your math learner skills to become the ultimate sword fighter to become victorious. Utilize all your skills to solve and win the idle RPG game.



**Find and Fight In Your Battle Arena**
Never get bored of participating in the hero battle game. In this math learner game, you must battle against the opponent sword fighter and complete the mental math challenge to become victorious. You can earn points and cash and use them to unlock new fighters, weapons, sword fighting headgear and more. Every player has their own hero where they can earn items with different rarities and equip those items. With 7 equipment slots and 868+ items, there’s a lot of grinding to do to collect them all!



**Relax and Solve the Idle RPG Challenge**
Not trying to compete in the battle arena? That’s OK! There’s also a “Relax” mode where you can solve problems, and earn rewards on your own time. No competition or time limit - just you and the problem. Complete the mental math challenge and relax as you solve the math learner tricky questions. With every correct answer you give, the sword fighter will hit the hero battle opponent. The more hits he makes, the weaker the opponent will become and you will come closer to victory in the battle arena.



* How to play BattleRush Arena – PVP Fight, Solve Math Problems*
* Each player is shown the same 4 random numbers. They must use these 4 numbers to try to make the answer equal to a number.
* Whoever solves the problem first takes a health point away from their opponent.
* The first one to knock out their opponents health points is crowned the victor!

Features of BattleRush Arena – PVP Fight, Solve Math Problems
* Simple and easy to play idle RPG game UI/UX

* Immersive hero battle game with mental math challenge
* Heroic battles involving sword fighter opponents
* Collect points to unlock new heads, weapons, powers and more
* Choose from different math learner game modes for best experience



Screen-time doesn’t have to be unproductive. Math can be FUN and REWARDING in Battlerush Arena!


Download and play BattleRush Arena – PVP Fight, Solve Math Problems today!

The app is completely FREE. There are no pay-to-wins or hidden gotchas. Your enjoyment is our priority!



To learn more about Battlerush Arena, visit www.hightailgames.com
